org.jetel.data.primitive

Class HugeDecimal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.primitive.HugeDecimal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Decimal, Numeric

    public final class HugeDecimal
extends java.lang.Object
implements Decimal
    Clover internal decimal value representation. Implements Decimal interface and use BigDecimal type for store value.
    Since:
    December 1, 2005
    See Also:
    Decimal, Serialized Form
